text.text_translated:
I work for a big IT company. The company's main office is in the USA. So I do all my work at home online.

This is good for me. I do not lose time travelling to work. I do not make small talk with people at the office. I work on different projects. So I can choose when I work. This is very important to me. I can easily take time off. I can go to my children's school shows. Or I can make a time to see the dentist.

But there is a bad side. I do not have clear work hours. I often work late in the evening. Sometimes I do not eat dinner. This is because I need to finish a job.
